snippet: Kelly Hardwick, who filed a discrimination lawsuit against the United States women’s national coach, the N.B.A. and USA Basketball, will be on a security detail at the London Games, the N.B.A. said.
abstract: Kelly Hardwick, NBA security official who filed a discrimination lawsuit against the United States women’s national coach Geno Auriemma, the NBA and USA Basketball, will be on a security detail at the 2012 Olympics; Hardwick claims Auriemma tried to kiss her on a trip to Russia in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Kelly Hardwick, who filed a discrimination lawsuit against the United States women’s national coach, the N.B.A. and USA Basketball, will be on a security detail at the London Games, the N.B.A. said.
